scripts.start-prod: npm install --verbose  --global nodemon && npm install sequelize sequelize-cli pg &&  npm install && sequelize db:migrate:undo:all --env=production && sequelize db:migrate --env=production && sequelize db:seed:all --env=production && nodemon ./bin/www
scripts.start-prod-heroku: npm install sequelize sequelize-cli pg && npm install && sequelize db:migrate --env=production && PRODUCTION_HEROKU=1 node ./bin/www
scripts.test: npm install sequelize sequelize-cli pg && sequelize db:migrate:undo:all --env=test_production && sequelize db:migrate --env=test_production && TEST_HEROKU=1 NODE_ENV=test_production node_modules/.bin/mocha tests/* --recursive --exit
scripts.tests: sequelize db:migrate:undo:all --env=test && sequelize db:migrate --env=test && NODE_ENV=test node_modules/.bin/mocha tests/* --recursive --exit
scripts.tests_seeds: sequelize db:migrate:undo:all --env=test && sequelize db:migrate --env=test && sequelize db:seed:all --seeders-path=/usr/src/tests/seeders/  --env=test && NODE_ENV=test node_modules/.bin/mocha tests/* --recursive --exit
scripts.nyc_tests: sequelize db:migrate:undo:all --env=test && sequelize db:migrate --env=test && NODE_ENV=test node_modules/.bin/nyc node_modules/.bin/mocha tests/* --recursive --exit
scripts.reset_dev: sequelize db:migrate:undo:all && sequelize db:migrate && sequelize db:seed:all
